Name: Tres Coops
Description: Garnished with chili powder, it pairs well with Mezcal.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Adornado con chile en polvo, combina bien con el mezcal.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 메스칼과 잘 어울리고, 칠리 파우더를 살짝 뿌렸어요.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Mit Chilipulver garniert, passt es gut zu Mezcal.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Garni de poudre de chili, se combien au mezcal.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Enfeitado com pó de pimenta, combina bem com Mezcal.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Украшенный порошком чили, он хорошо сочетается с мескалем.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Acı biberle tatlandırılmış, Mezcal'la iyi gider.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 树笼。加入点辣椒粉进行修饰，这款鸡尾酒与梅斯卡尔很配。
